definition: as if gaining the most precious treasure

sentences.english: Kitano hidden in captive discovered king unsanitary environment in north division.
sentences.chinese: 北野武藏在俘虜中如獲至寶的發現了王師北。

sentences.english: Li Ping did. He wanted his book back.
sentences.chinese: 弄到這本書，他如獲至寶。

sentences.english: He was thrilled, since it was the only hymnal in his church.
sentences.chinese: 姥爺如獲至寶，因爲那是教會里唯一的讚美詩集。

definition: lit. heart alarmed, body leaping (idiom); fear and trepidation in the face of disaster
to amuse oneself/to play with/to tease
grinning from ear to ear (idiom)/beaming with happiness
hard to distinguish real from imitation
lit. to use a dog's tail as a substitute for sable fur (idiom)/fig. a worthless sequel to a masterpiece
to take a lot of trouble (idiom); painstaking/at the cost of a lot of effort
